page.title: 15LOCAL HISTORY AND CREDITS
page.content: In Garsdon Parish Church is the 17th century memorial to Sir Lawrence Washington and his wife Anne.The Washington Arms, depicted on the memorial shows the stars and stripes, later used in the American flag. George Washington, 1st President of the United States of Amerca was descended from Sir Lawrence of Garsdon, who purchased Garsdon Manor in 1641. AUTHORS OF THIS TEXT BETH HUGHES, STUART CRONIN, ANDREW BATES, KATIE SPENCER, STEPHEN VINES, GAVIN VINES,JULIE AND MAXINE PARSONS, RUTH JENNINGS, JANE LANGLEY, GEOFFREY BATES,LAURA NEWMAN, ELIZABETH GOULD, CHRISTOPHER DAVEY, ZOE SHEWRING, ASHLEY HUGHES,JAMES MARETT, ALEXANDRA DUFFEY,ROBERTA WOOD, VICTORIA STACEY.
